title: The Celtics' Potential Trade Deadline Moves | Group Chat
description:
Justin, Tjarks, and Rob open with a discussion on Marvin Bagley's hand injury and what it means for this season and the future for the Kings (02:00). Later, they are joined by The Athletic’s Jared Weiss to discuss what potential trades can improve the Celtics roster ahead of the trade deadline (11:00)
Hosts: Justin Verrier, Jonathan Tjarks, and Rob Mahoney
Guest: Jared Weiss
